lead_paragraph: The unsolved shooting of Prime Minister Olof Palme in 1986 was a watershed moment in history that continues to fascinate and haunt the country.

headline.print_headline: 30 Years After Assassination, Leader’s Killing Still Haunts Sweden
headline.main: Questions Nag in Sweden 30 Years After Leader’s Assassination

snippet: The unsolved shooting of Prime Minister Olof Palme in 1986 was a watershed moment in history that continues to fascinate and haunt the country.
abstract: Sweden remains haunted by unsolved killing of Prime Min Olof Palme on 30th anniversary of his death; Palme espoused left-leaning values that once defined country but are being threatened by rise of far-right party and response to refugee crisis.
